member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap.GetCodec
member.summary: Gets the codec associated with the video encoder heap.
member.returns: The value from the enumeration specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap.GetCodecLevel
member.summary: Gets the codec level associated with the video encoder heap.
member.param: Receives a structure representing the codec profile specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap.GetCodecProfile
member.summary: Gets the codec profile associated with the video encoder heap.
member.param: Receives a structure representing the codec profile specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap.GetEncoderHeapFlags
member.summary: Gets the encoder heap flags with which the video encoder heap was initialized.
member.returns: The bitwise OR combination of values from the enumeration specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap.GetNodeMask
member.summary: Gets the node mask for the video encoder heap.
member.returns: The node mask value specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap.GetResolutionList
member.summary: Gets the resolution list associated with the video encoder heap.
member.param: The count of resolutions to retrieve. Get the number of resolutions with which the encoder heap was created by calling .
Receives a pointer to an array of structures representing the resolutions specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap.GetResolutionListCount
member.summary: Gets the resolution list count associated with the video encoder heap.
member.returns: The size of the resolution list provided in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoderHeap
member.summary: Represents a Direct3D 12 video encoder heap.
